metadata.name: Indosphere
metadata.description: This 1/1 artwork, named Indosphere belongs to the Artefact series. Indosphere refers to the architecture of culture that we see across Asia in terms of culture, form, and linguistics. The word is often used in areal linguistics. This common language of architecture wielded by the past artisans were the witnesses of unity even though we were divided from each other by language and ritual.
